column4: I got a couple of questions. None are really ubuntu specific. One is when using date how do you change the HW clock? I booted into windows and it messed my time up. Now ever time the computer gets rebooted I have to change the time again.
how old is the PC? could be the battery on the motherboard needs replacing?
Second is are any of you guys into astronomy? I was wondering are there any astronomy type programs for linux?
I doubt it. It was working fine, but I booted into windows and it changed the time.
